title: Phil Brown, Henning Wehn, Caroline Barker and Rick Edwards
content: Colin Murray is joined by Phil Brown, Henning Wehn, Caroline Barker and Rick Edwards as they look back on the events of 2021 and look forward to the big sporting year ahead.
contentSnippet: Colin Murray is joined by Phil Brown, Henning Wehn, Caroline Barker and Rick Edwards as they look back on the events of 2021 and look forward to the big sporting year ahead.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 5 Live
itunes.subtitle: Phil Brown, Henning Wehn, Caroline Barker and Rick Edwards join for a New Year special.
itunes.summary: Colin Murray is joined by Phil Brown, Henning Wehn, Caroline Barker and Rick Edwards as they look back on the events of 2021 and look forward to the big sporting year ahead.
